Qualified hairdresser and professional makeup artist, Stephanie Cainero is currently based in Sydney and has over 10 years of expert experience in all walks of the industry.

Renowned for her inspired versatility in captivating everything from look books to editorials, Tvc's to video clips. Steph's work has been seen in the likes of Cosmopolitan, Oyster, Russh, Studio Bride and international magazine Rias.

Steph has worked with fashion labels on and off the cat-walk with Nu+Nan, Khrysalis Couture, Leonardo Salinas, Nookie, Halo Designs and Bra's n Things to name a few. She has recently extended her artistry to the music video world as the woman behind the looks for clips for Miami Horror and Old Man River and worked on Aria nominated Hill Top Hoods .

Her extensive portfolio also extends to commercial television, recently with her work on advertisements for Nova Fm, A-League, Tip Top, AGL, KFC, Ferrero Rocher.
